settings.text:
Whatever life brings, eating first is always a good idea! The delivery service Uber Eats and Overkill have teamed up for an exciting collaboration and here you can find out all the important details.
In a hectic city like Berlin, nobody has time. So it's all the more convenient when you can simply have your favorite food delivered to your home or office. Pizza from the trendy Italian restaurant around the corner or delicious Asian dishes, Uber Eats delivers it to you!
Anyone who knows Overkill knows that we don't do things by halves. That's also the case with this partnership with Uber Eats because, in the end, you're the winner!

STREETFOOD meets STREETWEAR, with this claim there is a small but fine collection, which is exclusively available at Overkill! There will be a T-Shirt with a unique design from each of the three exclusive Uber partner restaurants. We have HABIBI, known for its shawarma and falafel dishes, MING DYNASTIE with the finest Asian cuisine and TRATTORIA FIDELIA, the experts for pizza and pasta.
But here's the kicker! Each T-Shirt has a code, which is a €20 voucher for Uber Eats orders! So you buy a strictly limited edition T-shirt for €45 and receive cashback in the form of a voucher for €20. Looking good and be repleted, what more could you want! But that's not all...
In addition to the T-shirts from the three restaurants, there is also an exclusive Overkill x Uber Eats capsule collection. This consists of two T-shirts for €45 each and a hoodie for €80. These items also come with a €20 voucher for orders at Uber Eats!
In addition, we will select 10 lucky winners from all buyers of the T-shirts or hoodies, who will receive a €500 Uber Eats voucher AND an Uber One subscription for 1 full year! With all these gifts, is it Christmas yet?!

To round it all off perfectly, we cordially invite you to our event on 24.11. - Overkill x Uber Eats presented by GATE. As always, you can expect free drinks, good music, nice people and a few surprises. At this event you can buy the T-shirts & hoodies exclusively and before everyone else. From 10 p.m. everyone else will have the opportunity to buy the limited edition items in our onlineshop.
